ai-patthana8.10:0.2_0: under the investigation of principles, illustrious and confusion,
ai-patthana8.10:1.1_2: nor do they arise because of impingement, etc., arise with no cause or condition.
ai-patthana8.10:3.1_1: This is the section in brief.
ai-patthana8.10:5.1_0: or even a canopy covered in the same way.
ai-patthana8.10:6.1_0: Not repulsion is a condition for the repulsion of the teaching; for the sake of the Dhamma is a condition for the non-existence condition.
ai-patthana8.10:6.1_1: Not accepting, he doesn’t get the resentment condition for the sake of non-existence condition.
ai-patthana8.10:6.1_2: Not accepting, the Dhamma, or the offering of the non-existence, and the resentment condition for the sake of non-object condition.
ai-patthana8.10:7.1_0: the repulsion of the teaching, not by means of the penetration of the Dhamma, nor by the objection of the Dhamma,
ai-patthana8.10:7.1_1: the condition being by way of repulsion, not with the object of the Dhamma,
ai-patthana8.10:7.1_2: This is the section in brief.
ai-patthana8.10:8.1_0: There are two projecting the causes: four supports next to each other,
ai-patthana8.10:8.1_1: one person was reborn in a heavenly realm. And two or three drops of deeds have been reborn in a place of loss. ...
ai-patthana8.10:8.1_2: The three faculties associated with the five faculties is threefold. ...
